Description.value: Targeting Context
Unique ID of the payment.
The payment amount.
The payment status.
Unique ID of the payment method.
The payment method display name.
The payment method description.
The type of the payment method.
Unique ID of the shipping method.
The shipping method display name.
The shipping method description.
Represents the formatted display template of a displayable Commerce Server Advertisement or Discount.
Unique ID of the Commerce Server Advertisement or Discount used to generate this content.
Contains the formatted display content of a Commerce Server Advertisement or Discount.
The name of Commerce Server cache from which the advertisement was retrieved.
Represents the criteria used to select advertising content from the Commerce Server marketing system.
The id of the user whose information will be provided as contextual data to the content selection framework. This property is optional.
The id of the user addres that will provided as contextual data to the content selection framework. This property is optional.
The name of the catalog containing a product that will be provided as contextual data to the content selection framework. This property is optional.
The id of the product that will provided as contextual data to the content selection framework. This property is optional.
The id of the product variant that will be provided as contextual data to the content selection framework. This property is optional.
The name of the page group for which the advertising content is being selected.
A name representing the size of the content to be selected. This corresponds to the tag name of a Commerce Server display size. This property is optional.
A name representing the variety of content to be selected. This corresponds to the name of a Commerce Server display template. This property is optional.
The name of the contexts in which the advertising content should be selected. This corresponds to the name of one or more Commerce Server content selector. This property is required.

The ids of advertisements that have been selected for the current presentation context. When returned as part of query, this will contain the ids of all advertisements selected. This property is optional.

The ids of the advertisements that have been recently viewed by the user for which the advertising content is being selected. When returned as part of a query, this will have the Ids of all advertisements selected appended to the list. This property is optional.
A value indicating if the user is anonymous or not.
Represents extensible targeting information that can be provided to the content selection framework.
Represents the advertising content that was selected as part of a ContentSelector query.
Represents a set of ContentSelectors that will be queried in a way that prevents duplicate Advertisements from being selected, and with in a single operation request.

The ids of the advertisements that have been recently viewed by the user for which the advertising content is being selected. When returned as part of a query, this will have the Ids of all advertisements selected appended to the list. This property is optional.
Represents the set of ContentSelectors that will be queried.
Represents an advertising event that was observed at the presentation layer that should be recorded so that advertising goals can be measured.
The id of the advertisement that was the source of the event.
The id of the page group on which the event was observed.
The context in which the source advertisement was retreived. This represents the name of the Commerce Server cache that contains the advertisement.
The name of the event that was observed.
Represents the data that defines how and when a discount can be applied to a purchase order.
The unique id of the discount definition.
The id of the parent campaign of this discount definition.
The date and time at which this entity was last modified.
The programatic name of the discount definition.
The content that will describe the discount to shoppers when it is applied to a basket.
The date and time at which this discount definition becomes valid
The date and time at which this discount defintion becomes void

Defines what type of entity this discount can be applied to. Predefined values include Shipping_Discount for discounts that apply to shipping costs, OrderLevelDiscount for discounts that apply to the entire order subtotoal, and LineItemDiscount for discounts that apply to individual line itmes in a purchase order.
Specifies the currency or percentage value of the discount
Specifies whether the Value property is a currency or currency ammount.
Defines which discout definitions related to a catalog entity should be selected during a query.
Specifies the context from which discount definitions should be selected. This should be the name of a Commerce Server discounts cache.
If true, discount definitions that specify the target catalog entity as an award will be selected.
If true, discount definitions that specify the target catalog entity as a condition will be selected.
If true, discounts definitions that have eligibility requirements will be selected. Otherwise, discounts definitions with eligibility requirements will be omitted.
If true, discounts definitions that require a promotion code will be selected. Otherwise, discounts definitions that require promotion codes will be omitted.
If true, discounts definitions that are not currently valid will be selected. Otherwise, discounts definitions that are not currently valid will be omitted.
Represents a geographical region.
The ID of the region.
The display name for the region.
The states and-or provinces in the region.
Represents a state or a province.
The display name of the state or province.
Provides order date range search capabilities.
The user id.
The lower-bound for the created date search.
The upper-bound for the created date search.
Basic Relationship Type
Catalog Relationship Type
Number of the related items

LanguageSpecific.value: fr: Number of the related items

Message.value: Quantity must be within the defined range.

LanguageSpecific.value: fr: Quantity must be within the defined range.

Description.value: Is the relationship enabled?
